Required

Attaches to PRO Racing Base
  • RS Track Wheel
  • RS Round Wheel
  • MOMO x Logitech SIM GT 320
  • MOMO x Logitech SIM GT Racer 290
  • Windows 10/11
    • Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One (when connected to a Logitech Wheel base compatible with PlayStation - compatibility not tested nor endorsed by Sony Interactive Entertainment)
  • Windows 10/11
    • PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4 (when connected to a Logitech Wheel base compatible with PlayStation - compatibility not tested nor endorsed by Sony Interactive Entertainment )

Description

The Logitech G RS Wheel Hub is designed for compatibility and versatility. Pair the RS Wheel Hubs with any Logitech G Direct Drive Base for single, double, or triple- platform compatibility using the quick release attachment. Mount any R Series or Logitech G x MOMO steering wheel, customize the RGB rev lights, and adjust or remove the gear shifters.

Features

Specifications

Dimensions
  • Height: 5.98 in (152 mm)
  • Length: 4.72 in (120 mm)
  • Width: 9.33 in (237 mm)
  • Weight: 26.74 oz (758 g)

Contents

  • RS Wheel Hub
  • Bolts
  • Hex Key
  • Sticker Sheet
  • IID
